DOC.brief_summary: The purpose study develop evaluate dietary change program specifically low-income , African-American woman risk develop diabetes due obesity . The program use innovative approach emphasize risk awareness , self-efficacy , skill train active learning exercise relate healthy eating . The program deliver peer educator community address economic cultural factor important program participant .
DOC.brief_title: Eat Well Live Well Nutrition Program
DOC.criteria: AfricanAmerican Women Aged 2555 year No current diabetes , obese ( 20 % ideal body weight ) In community neighborhood
